references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a foundational model for high-resolution image generation, which is highly relevant to the video generation methods discussed.
This paper introduces diffusion transformers (DiTs), which are the core foundation of the proposed DiTFlow method.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), which are the theoretical basis of diffusion models used throughout the paper.

references.paper_title: Cogvideox: Text-to-video diffusion models with an expert transformer
references.reason: CogVideoX is the state-of-the-art video generation model used in this paper's experiments, making it a crucial reference for comparison.

references.paper_title: Video diffusion models are training-free motion interpreter and controller
references.reason: This paper introduces an optimization-based approach to motion transfer in diffusion models, which is a closely related and influential prior work.
